name: Endless Shooter (Con Cá)
description:
Facing an empire army ? Can you make it through STAGE 50 xD

Endless Shooter Game

Author : Con Ca Cam

Keys :

- W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move

- R or KEYPAD0 to reload bullet

- B or KEYPAD1 to open/close stat board

- Hold SPACE or RIGHT CONTROL to enable manashield

- ESC to quit game

Stats : You have 10 stat points at the beginning

- Strength increase damage

- Stamina increase health

- Health Regen increase health percent regen/second

- Energy increase mana

- Mana Regen increase mana percent regen/second

- Defense decrease mob damage percent/hit (main character)

- Agility increase move speed

- Dexterity decrease reload time

- Ammo increase amount of shoots/reload

- Fire Rate decrease time/shoot

- Bullets increase bullet/shoot

- Bullets Life Time increase life time of the bullet

- Bullet Speed increase bullet's movement speed

- Mana Shield Absorption decrease mob damage percent/hit (like Defense but only when activate mana shield)

- Mana Shield Consume decrease mana percent/second while activating

- Mana Shield Activate decrease mana percent/activate
